forumNotes.author: DaXearo
forumNotes.content:
Hi,  

I was wondering of this was possible:  

I have a 4Gb Sandisk Cruzer U3 Titanium USB stick and I want to DUAL BOOT Slax (Linux) AND Windows XP (or BartPE or some other small XP version) on it PLUS I want to use the free space on the stick as ENCRYPTED storage data (TrueCrypt).  

Is that possible?  
Is there some guide for it?  
I tried for 2 days but I can't make it happen...  

Thanks!

forumNotes.author: was_jaclaz
forumNotes.content:
> Is that possible?
Yes. ![:1st:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/1st.gif)  

> Is there some guide for it?
Yes, of course you are on your own for the Truecrypt part, let's say that first you succeed in the Slax booting, than you succeed in the XP or PE booting, then you succeed in dual booting those, and later will try with the truecrypt partition.  

And to reply to the unasked question:  
> If yes, where can I find it?
